skills.name: Immersion
skills.description: Spell - An energy wave dealing damage based on lost mana.

skills.name: Arcane Torrent
skills.description: Spell - Devastate enemies in front of you with arcane power.

skills.name: Raven Familiar
skills.description: Special Summon - Grants an aura which increases caster prowess.

skills.name: Mana Sweep
skills.description: Spell - Steals mana and damages nearby enemies based on lost mana.

skills.name: Superposition
skills.description: Warp - Short ranged teleport.

skills.name: Antimass
skills.description: Spell - Converts your mana to health.

skills.name: Arcane Fury
skills.description: Buff - Unleash powerful reserves of arcane energy.

skills.name: Flamefront
skills.description: Spell - Casts a wave of exploding firebolts in front of you.

skills.name: Incineration
skills.description: Upgrade - Your mana empowers Flamefront.

skills.name: Pyroblast
skills.description: Spell - A massive boulder of fire that explodes on impact.

skills.name: Pyre
skills.description: Upgrade - You gain physical resistance while casting Pyroblast.

skills.name: Flamestrike
skills.description: Spell - Calls down a massive pillar of flames from the sky.

skills.name: Havoc
skills.description: Spell - A devastating fiery incantation.

skills.name: Forked Lightning
skills.description: Spell - Casts multiple bolts of lightning to scorch your enemies.

skills.name: Thunderstone
skills.description: Spell - Throw a charged stone that emits charged bolts on impact.

skills.name: Eye of the Storm
skills.description: Upgrade - You become shielded while casting thunderstone.

skills.name: Tempest
skills.description: Spell - Casts powerful lightning bolts at all nearby enemies.

skills.name: Mind Spark
skills.description: Upgrade - Your energy reserves enhance Tempest.

skills.name: Entanglement
skills.description: Upgrade - Superposition leaves you entangled.

skills.name: Frigid Nova
skills.description: Melee Spell - Emit a wave of creeping frozen doom.

skills.name: Crystalline Barrier
skills.description: Buff - A protective shield freezing melee attackers.

skills.name: Glacial Torrent
skills.description: Attack - Unleash a freezing cascade through your weapon.

skills.name: Wintertide
skills.description: Warp Strike - Teleports you to a target enemy.

skills.name: Rime
skills.description: Upgrade - Your energy reserves improve Wintertide.

skills.name: Hoar Frost
skills.description: Upgrade - Adds cold damage to Wintertide.

skills.name: Frostborn
skills.description: Passive - Empowers your cold tree spells.

skills.name: Lorenado
skills.description: Spell - Whirlwind of cursed books and forbidden knowledge.

skills.name: Decay
skills.description: Upgrade - Greatly increases haunt duration.

skills.name: Miasma
skills.description: Spell - Field of living black magic that poisons and haunts enemies.

skills.name: Elucidation
skills.description: Upgrade - Number of Lorenadoes increase with poison duration.

skills.name: Arachnomancy
skills.description: Spell - A mass of venomous spiders envelops the target.

skills.name: Blight
skills.description: Passive - Energy enhances entropy.

skills.name: Mooncall
skills.description: Buff - Improves your melee combat prowess.

skills.name: Bladestorm
skills.description: Attack - Unleash magical homing blades.

skills.name: Determination
skills.description: Passive - Offense is the best defense.

skills.name: Primordial Might
skills.description: Upgrade - Mooncall increases elemental power instead of physical.

skills.name: Fatal Focus
skills.description: Passive - Increases your deadly strike at the cost of your maximum block chance.

skills.name: Cold Blooded
skills.description: Upgrade - Using Bladestorm with a crystal sword triggers a glacial burst.

skills.name: Fusillade
skills.description: Projectile - A mystic trap that spits waves of bladed steel.

skills.name: Arcane Sustenance
skills.description: Upgrade - Mana Shield is improved while Fusillade is active.

skills.name: Premonition
skills.description: Upgrade - Maximum block chance is increased durig Fusillade.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Living Flame
skills.description: Passive - Grants life regeneration and increases max life.

skills.name: Firedance
skills.description: Buff - A circle of sacred fire that empowers spells and attacks.

skills.name: Warp Armor
skills.description: Passive - Magically increases your total defense rating.

skills.name: Nova Charge
skills.description: Buff - Periodically discharge static novas when near enemies.

skills.name: Snow Queen
skills.description: Passive - Block chance based on energy and damage to class spells.

skills.name: Ice Elementals
skills.description: Summon - Ice elementals with a freezing nova attack.

skills.name: Vengeful Power
skills.description: Passive - Increases spell damage when struck and crushes attackers.

skills.name: Hive
skills.description: Buff - Periodically unleash deadly insect swarms when near enemies.

skills.name: Symbol of Esu
skills.description: Passive - Increases your elemental absorption and spell focus.

skills.name: Force Blast
skills.description: Debuff - Sonic blast that weakens enemies.

skills.name: Chronofield
skills.description: Curse - Warp spacetime to slow enemies and distort matter.

skills.name: Witch Blood
skills.description: Passive - Sorceress spells cast from a full life orb do more damage.

skills.name: Baneblade
skills.description: Buff - Gain the powers of a warrior crowned by the goddess.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
